## About {#about}

Welcome to **TithiShop**! We are passionate about bringing you authentic Bengali ethnic foods made with traditional recipes passed down through generations. Our products are crafted with love, using the finest ingredients and time-honored methods to ensure you get the true taste of Bengal in every bite.

We specialize in homemade pickles, preserves, and other traditional Bengali delicacies that are perfect for adding flavor to your meals and connecting you to your cultural roots.

```{=html}
  <div class="slideshow-dots">

<script>
(function() {
  let slideIndex = 0;
  let autoPlayInterval = null;
  let slides = [];
  let dots = [];
  
  function initSlideshow() {
    slides = Array.from(document.getElementsByClassName("slide")).filter(slide => {
      const img = slide.querySelector('img');
      if (img) {
        img.onerror = function() {
          slide.style.display = 'none';
        };
        if (img.complete && img.naturalHeight === 0) {
          slide.style.display = 'none';
          return false;
        }
      }
      return slide.style.display !== 'none';
    });
    
    dots = Array.from(document.getElementsByClassName("dot"));
    
    document.querySelectorAll('.dot').forEach((dot, index) => {
      if (!slides[index] || slides[index].style.display === 'none') {
        dot.style.display = 'none';
      }
    });
  }
  
  function showSlide(n) {
    if (slides.length === 0) return;
    
    if (n >= slides.length) slideIndex = 0;
    else if (n < 0) slideIndex = slides.length - 1;
    else slideIndex = n;
    
    slides.forEach(slide => {
      if (slide.style.display !== 'none') {
        slide.classList.remove("active");
      }
    });
    
    dots.forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove("active"));
    
    if (slides[slideIndex] && slides[slideIndex].style.display !== 'none') {
      slides[slideIndex].classList.add("active");
      if (dots[slideIndex]) {
        dots[slideIndex].classList.add("active");
      }
    }
  }
  
  function nextSlide() {
    showSlide(slideIndex + 1);
  }
  
  function prevSlide() {
    showSlide(slideIndex - 1);
  }
  
  function goToSlide(n) {
    showSlide(n - 1);
    resetAutoPlay();
  }
  
  function startAutoPlay() {
    if (autoPlayInterval) clearInterval(autoPlayInterval);
    autoPlayInterval = setInterval(nextSlide, 5000);
  }
  
  function resetAutoPlay() {
    if (autoPlayInterval) clearInterval(autoPlayInterval);
    startAutoPlay();
  }
  
  window.changeSlide = function(n) {
    if (n > 0) nextSlide();
    else prevSlide();
    resetAutoPlay();
  };
  
  window.currentSlide = function(n) {
    goToSlide(n);
  };
  
  function initialize() {
    initSlideshow();
    if (slides.length > 0) {
      showSlide(0);
      startAutoPlay();
    }
  }
  
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initialize);
  } else {
    initialize();
  }
})();
</script>
```
